DataElement.preferredName: FACIT-D Questionnaire Additional Concerns Diarrhea Subscale Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value representing a calculated score using the eleven Likert scales scores included in the FACIT-D Additional Concerns section.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Diarrhea Additional Concerns Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A symptom-specific subscale of the FACIT scales that is used to assess how diarrhea affects an individual's life._Added; extra; further._A matter of interest or importance._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Diarrhea
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A symptom-specific subscale of the FACIT scales that is used to assess how diarrhea affects an individual's life.
